title: Divinity Original Sin Update v1.0.130.0 - v1.0.169.0 Cracked Xde
description:
Divinity Original Sin Update v1.0.130.0 - v1.0.169.0 Cracked Xdelta


Run exe & play! Be patient update takes awhile to complete.


Divinity Original Sin Update v1.0.169.0 Changelog:

In anticipation of the launch of the new companion DLC (which will be free for everyone) here is a new update which will further improve the game.

The most notable improvements are the new listening functionality for dialogs when playing in cooperative multiplayer, a big layer of polish on the spell and skill effects and a number of bugfixes. Please note that the new companions will only be available after installing the free DLC (to be released later today) and can only be accessed when starting a new game.

Code:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added listening functionality to dialogs. Now you can listen to ongoing dialogs and see the complete history to better follow what is being said.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue with logging for cooperative dialogs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢A lot of fixes for savegames that refused to load
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Sheath/Unsheath fixed timing of attachment of shields.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Rare crash fix in specific script calls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Rare crash fix in extinguish surface action
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fading objects and fog triggers now work for all players instead of just the local player.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where rotation on objects could get corrupted, resulting in huge objects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Bugfix in character movement while mouse is pressed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed some UI's that were always loaded in memory. Now they are loaded when needed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue when swapping character during a rock-paper-scissor minigame.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed some doors that were blocking after they were destroyed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added text bubble effect above characters in dialog
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Dragging action will cancel when going into trade
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed rare crash with attachments on objects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed rare issue where the mouse cursor could become corrupted
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Weight can no longer become negative
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Character should slide less when arriving at their target position
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Dragging an item onto a container will put it in the inventory now
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Correctly substract money when hiring henchman
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Correctly delete item when adding to an inventory fails.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed exclamation mark sometimes being attached wrong.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed rare crashes when going to and coming from the Homestead
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed double spaces in combat log
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Changed requirement from Crafing to Tenebrium to craft tenebrium weapons
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue with sheath/unsheat after sitting or sleeping
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue with wrong resurrecting event
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Skillbar items in a container no longer get removed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix for surface sound underflow
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Skill are reloaded when switching mods
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Remove blackrot status when you have tenebrium ability
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added "Additional Content" menu to the main menu
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where characters in combat could sometimes take characters out of the combat into account
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue with disconnected during the rock-paper-scissor minigame
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where character sometimes dont follow after a load

Story:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢War of the Bloodstones, some mountain men could be neutral during the war
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Quest blocker in Nadia quest when you talk to Lawrence
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Arhu thinks that everything you drop in his house is his property, is fixed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Issue with killing the Trife with companions without starting the end fight
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Imps were not appearing on Mac version
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢AI mesh fixes at Baron of Bones house, now the player can teleport the chest in the southern room
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Items on some graves drop under the ground when dug out
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You could start a conversation with Lurrean while he was walking away
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You could ask William to teleport you to Wally once the quest was solved, this is removed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Incorrect log entry on mushroom barrier removal
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Couldn't select enemies that were inside click through bushes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Zou could talk to Yox while Frederick was approaching and the quest would hang
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢How to handle Tenebrium quest book had been increased to unlimited uses
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Cyseal burning ship got a sound event, so you can hear it burn now
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The Lawrence vs miners situation used to get blocked but that is fixed now
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Teleport Mirror in Luculla Mines doesn't want to teleport companions
Note: a limited amount of these story fixes require you to start a new game

Audio:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Overall audio balance has been updated.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The burning ship in Cyseal had sound (burning & sinking) which did not work, this has been fixed now.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Player weapons such as Two Handed Sword and Magic Staff got new dedicated sounds when sheathing their weapon.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The Orcs in the game now have extra foley sounds including a huge roar, a sobbing orc and a really gross Ã¢â‚¬ËœbuttscratchÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¦
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢For the new area, dedicated ambient sounds have been added, as well as custom sounds for a very loathsome druid and some really disgusting fx for certain pigs

MAC Specific:
This update brings all Mac tweaking options into a single place. In order to use it you have to hold 'Command' key on game startup.
The new launcher has options to:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Don't show any OS X notification popups while in game. They won't even blink.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Disable Touch Support if you feel like it
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Quickly click on OS X Path control to discover your saves directory
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Temporarily switch game to windowed mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Precisely track mouse and trackpad gestures and taps
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Disable hardware fade and gamma effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enable OpenGL performance tweaks and a heap of assorted workarounds

Divinity Engine Editor:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed some problems that existed when loading mods
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed some memory leaks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added info when trying to save terrain that is not editable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed saving new story items
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed story editor crash
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed crash when entering game mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed position of camera when switching between cameras
